data.actual_result: The audit logs shows that 'read messages' permission was denied as it was a text channel although its not
data.expected_result: The audit logs should show that the permission 'view channel' was denied for the given voice channel
data.short_description: Audit logs on mobile shows wrong info for voice channel view permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a VOICE channel with default settings - Update the 'everyone' role and DENY 'view channel' perm - Check audit logs on mobile. It might also be problematic on pc too I didn't test
